returns.para: Returns a value from the enumeration.
Returns an HRESULT value that gives additional information about the last error.

param.name: error
param.para: The error code, specified as an value.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: error
param.para: An HRESULT value that gives additional information about the last error.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides the current error status for the Media Engine.

remarks.para: The IMFMediaError interface corresponds to the MediaError object in HTML5.
To get a pointer to this interface, call .
